Summary: Witnessed a triangular craft change into a rectangle and then split into 2 crafts.
divs: sighting details1. i was outside my house, i just stepped outside for a smoke with a friend, its was 9:30 pm and the sky was clear. 2. i looked up because i heard a large plane flying over, like a normal large passenger plane, which is normal, they fly overhead all the time, but there was also a large (3xs bigger than the jet) triangular craft following close behind. i say it was triangular because it had a white light on each tip of the triangle, and one large blinking red light in the center. 3. i thought maybe it was a stealth bomber because of its shape. 4. as i watched the craft, it seemed to slow down, then it twisted\spun slowly on its side and changed from the triangular shape (based on the 3 white lights i mentioned above) into a rectangular shape (now it had 4 white lights and the red blinking light disappeared). it remained a rectangular shape for a few seconds (maybe 15 seconds), slowly twisting the entire time, and then it "split" or separated into 2 separate crafts. 5. i was excited. 6. the objects remained moving east from me until i lost sight of it over a mountain range.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Fortuna
There were no other sightings in Fortuna on or around January 20th 2009
